instructions: In the People list, tap the name of the person you want to follow. Tap Ask To Follow Location.
In the People list, tap the name of the person you want to remove. Tap Remove [ name ], then tap Remove.
Tap the table, then tap the Format button . Tap Table, then tap to turn Table Name on or off.
Double-tap the table name at the top of the table. The insertion point appears in the name. Drag the insertion point to where you want to edit, then make your changes.
